long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is goodnite fornite, an extension I created to remove fortnite from my browser. I got tired of shitty click bait on YouTube so I made this to remove it. Yes, all the comic sans is done ironically but the extension itself is non intrusive and can be disabled at any time. All it is doing is finding divs with keywords and then hiding them.
